title: Grid Interconnection Request Filing
description: A project developer needs to file a formal grid interconnection request with the ISO/RTO for a new solar project.

tasks.description: Identify the correct interconnection request form and required technical studies for the project's size and location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides links to the correct forms and a list of required studies (e.g., Feasibility, System Impact).

tasks.description: Compile all necessary project data, including single-line diagrams, inverter specifications, and site layout.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all required technical documentation.

tasks.description: Complete the interconnection request application and attach all required documents for submission.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a completed application package ready for filing.
